text: 1.20 Sek 4.2, Plp 2.15, Lep 1.12, 1.16, 2.1, 3.1 Pen tap nɨgeban okok, takaw we gɨl jɨj ne ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb agak. Lam gol dɨl gɨlak anep kugul nɨgeban okok, God binɨb ne pelpel apnan gɨpal man awl keke anep kugul ak agak. Pen gap anep kugul ak, ñɨn yɨpɨd kɨd yad adek ak nɨgeban okok, ensel anep kugul ak mɨdeb agak. God binɨb ne pelpel apnan gɨpal man awl keke anep kugul ak, ensel anɨb okok kɨli kɨlop kod mɨdebal agak.
